text: Ara phira’a'una sampradayera netara balala, ‘apani ki musa o tara sampradayake yamine biparyaya srsti karate ebam apanake o apanara upasyaderake [1] barjana karate debena? Se balala, ‘sighra'i amara tadera putraderake hatya karaba ebam tadera nariderake jibita rakhaba. Ara niscaya amara tadera upara saktidhara [2].’
